Class Mayflower

  • java.lang.Object
    • mayflower.Mayflower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Mayflower
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double VERSION
      The current version of the Mayflower package

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mayflower(java.lang.String name, int width, int height, Stage stage)
      Opens a window of the specified width and height, sets the specified stage as the active stage, and starts the update thread.

      Returns the height of the window in pixels

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mayflower

        public Mayflower(java.lang.String name,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 Stage stage)
        Opens a window of the specified width and height, sets the specified stage as the active stage, and starts the update thread.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to display at the top of the window
        width - the width of the window in pixels
        height - the height of the window in pixels
        stage - the active stage

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the update thread.

        Every updateSpeed milliseconds this method will:

        • update the active stage
        • update all actors on the active stage
        • redraw the screen
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • setStage

        public void setStage(Stage s)
        Sets the active stage
        Parameters:
        s - stage to be made active

      • getStage

        public Stage getStage()
        Returns the active Stage
        Returns:
        the active Stage

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns the width of the window in pixels
        Returns:
        width of the window in pixels

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Returns the height of the window in pixels
        Returns:
        height of the window in pixels

      • setUpdateSpeed

        public void setUpdateSpeed(int ms)
        Sets how often the update() method is called. Default: ~16 times per second
        Parameters:
        ms - how many milliseconds between each call to update()

      • getUpdateSpeed

        public int getUpdateSpeed()
        Returns the update speed
        Returns:
        update speed

      • getMouse

        public Mouse getMouse()
        Returns a Mouse object with the current status of the mouse since the last call to the update method
        Returns:

      • getKeyboard

        public Keyboard getKeyboard()
        Returns a Keyboard object with the current status of the keyboard since the last call to the update method
        Returns:

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Forcibly stops the application from running
